text:
@FLOTUS Amazing that Melania has ignored her @realDonaldTrump  actions and words that incite the violence, hatred and harm she now condemns.  She’s ignored his incompetence on Covid19, driving a growing economy he inherited into the ground, and isolating the US globally.

#VoteOutHate
